meanings.sent1: The racemous flowers bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The plant's racemous arrangement of flowers made it stand out.
meanings.sent3: The racemous display of flowers seemed to dance in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her hair cascaded down her back in a racemous flow.
meanings.sent5: The racemous pattern of stars in the sky was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: Resembling a raceme in form or structure.
meanings.sent1: The racemous branches of the tree spread out elegantly.
meanings.sent2: The racemous design of the necklace was intricate and delicate.
meanings.sent3: The racemous arrangement of chairs in the room looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: His words flowed in a racemous manner, connecting ideas seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The racemous clouds in the sky resembled a painting.
